name: Echoes of Karma
description:
Echoes of Karma is a game about a flirty demon and gay magician who travel the multiverse. As they travel, they discover a threat known as Glitch. The game is a turn based RPG, but with Blocking Mechanics during the enemy turn. Save TP by skipping your turn to use higher level abilities!

Echoes of Karma is episodic, and each episode lasts around 20 minutes. There's also many game modes planned, such as boss rushes, galleries and soundtests, and more! We release regular updates to the game (multiple times a year), and you can find the next episode and the next update in the game's ROADMAP section!

This game is in Early Access, and will receive regular updates at least once a month until Episode 12 is released. Once episode 12 is released, updates will still occur multiple times a year, but will be less frequent. The game currently has 6 episodes!

Note: Game is best played with a controller.
